EmailTemplate.name: AeroMSPContractsReminder30Days
EmailTemplate.subject: {Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Customer,
As notified previously your MSP Engines/APU Contract 4400xxxxx expiration date is approaching and after XX.XX.XXXX you will no longer have coverage.
If you have not started the below steps please do so at this time.
Resolve any questions or concerns related to your contract Review new features/options available for each plan Send a fully executed copy of the contract Advise if aircraft is sold or otherwise not flying
Important Pricing Info â€“ If your contract is not renewed by the expiration date it will be terminated and be subject to reinstatement.
*** Thank you for doing business with us, your case tracking number for this renewal request is provided above. If you wish to communicate with us further about this renewal, you may reply to this e-mail - please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses. ***
Kind regards,
MSP Engines & APU Contract Administration ______Q Honeywell
